dmca.title: Legal Issues / Stolen material
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. 

-----Original Message-----
From: Kris Chase [mailto:itbekrischase@gmail.com] 
Posted At: Saturday, October 14, 2006 3:55 PM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: Legal Issues / Stolen material
Subject: Legal Issues / Stolen material


To whom it may concern:

Hi, my sites ( xgenerators.com ) and ( viewaviewer.com ) have both been
getting hacked throughout the past two weeks by the owner of
Myspacegeeks.com .  Besides the fact hes told me he was going to via AIM
conversations I also have his ip address which i obtained by going
through my server logs, which points to Australia, where he told me he
lives.

If you look at http://www.myspacegeeks.com/tracker/
and my site  www.viewaviewer.com
you will see a large similarity, I coded viewaviewer.com which has a php
and sql backend, both which are identical to whats on his site, when
putting in variables from my scripts, it functions as it would on my own
site, but on his, hes copied multiple files and put them on his site.

Im looking to get his site shut down / suspended and even further legal
action may be taken against him due to his accessing of my server
without permsiion.


--
Owner/Founder
Kris Chase
www.xgenerators.com
